articles.title: Wildfire, a game I first wrote about back in 2015, is finally almost done, and is looking very, very - Kotaku
articles.description: Wildfire, a game I first wrote about back in 2015, is finally almost done, and is looking very, very cool, combining 2D action with stealth and some interesting environmental controls. It’s out on PC next month.

Overwatch League tries to galvanize interest with a May Madness tournament - Engadget
articles.description: Teams will battle in two regional tournaments for prize money and bonus wins towards their season records.
articles.content: So far in 2020, teams have been playing for their season records. Games over the first three weekends of May will still count towards overall win-loss records. Actual tournament matches won’t, but the top four squads in each region will earn bonus wins toward… [+1569 chars]
